rows.label: qev086001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Lin-san, what's wrong-meh?
Your hands stopped moving-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hurry up with the food-meh!
Tatsu is hungry-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah, sorry.
Just wait a moment, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Lin, what's wrong?
Are you feeling unwell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0006
rows.name:
Actually, a transmission loss was confirmed
in the Industrial Area's energy supply system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0007
rows.name:
The place you repaired before, right?
What's the loss rate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0009
rows.name:
If that's the case, it should still be
below the safety margin, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0011
rows.name:
But, with the repair I did,
I should have eliminated all the loss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0012
rows.name: I thought the loss would stay below measurable levels for at least a year[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0013
rows.name: Ah...so it's a mechanic's pride, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086001_MSG0014
rows.name:
Alright. We'll take this on as a mission.
Let's go do a re-inspection.[ST:wait ]
